name: The Whale's Song
description:
Play as a baby orca whale and swim through the ocean! Collect music notes to talk to your mother and see the love! 

This is a game I made in 24 hours for GGJ. I decided to make a really small game and create all of the art assets and music myself. :)
Huge shout-out to ISG, and Seattle Indies for keeping me company while working on the game and to Steve for helping with the seagrass shader. :)

An HTML5 version is coming soon! :D
